si.title: අත්අඩංගුවට ගැනීම
body_lines: ඡන්දය පැළඳීම සම්බන්ධයෙන් මිනිසෙකු අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ

en.title: Arrest
body_lines: A man has been arrested for tearing down the ballot

summary_lines: Man arrested for destroying ballots. Incident raises concerns about election integrity and potential voter suppression. Investigation ongoing.
